paragraphs.body: Cheung was born in Hong Kong, China, and earned his degree in biology at the University of San Francisco.
paragraphs.text: Cheung was born in Hong Kong, China, and earned his degree in biology at the University of San Francisco.

paragraphs.body: In May 2008, Cheung was presented with the Asian Pacific Islander Heritage Award for Excellence in Arts and Entertainment by California's Asian Pacific Islander Legislative Caucus.
paragraphs.text: In May 2008, Cheung was presented with the Asian Pacific Islander Heritage Award for Excellence in Arts and Entertainment by California's Asian Pacific Islander Legislative Caucus.

paragraphs.body: Cheung has guest starred on many television series, including MacGyver, Magnum, P.I., The A-Team, Knight Rider, How I Met Your Mother, Seinfeld, NYPD Blue, ER, The West Wing, Seibu Keisatsu, and Lost. Some of his film appearances include Rambo: First Blood Part II, RoboCop 2, Lethal Weapon 4, Rush Hour, and Starsky & Hutch.
